Ponygon`s Lightning Speed!
Merumerume~!! Umagon Denkousekka
episode.summary: Ponygon has returned with his partner Kafk Sunbeam to help Zatch and Kiyo! Kafk reads the first spell “Shudoruk,” and Ponygon morphs, armor-clad and battle-ready. He dashes towards Dalmos and fearlessly pounces on him, all the while effortlessly evading h Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 熱き思いよとどけ! 第7の術ザグルゼム!!
Reach, Burning Feelings! The Seventh Spell, Zaguruzemu!
Atsuki Omoi yo Todoke! Dai 7 no Jutsu Zaguruzemu!!
episode.summary: Zofis had attained infinite power with a mask linked to the Stone of Moonlight in Demolt’s chamber. Zofis loses his impregnable shield after the Stone of Moonlight is destroyed. But even so, Zofis pulls out his trump card…Koko his partner, Sherry’s former Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナオミちゃんを追跡せよ!!
Follow Naomi!
Naomi-chan o Tsuiseki seyo!!
episode.summary: After Kiyo goes to school, Zatch volunteers to do the shopping for Kiyo`s mother. Ponygon accompanies him, and on the way, he notices that the park has become a mess. One of the playground children notices Zatch and tells him it is his fault. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 守り抜け! 約束の赤い魔本
The Red Spell Book of Promise!
Mamorinuke! Yakusoku no Akai Mahon
episode.summary: In their short time together Ponygon and Kafk unlock their second spell and win their first battle! Exhausted and relieved, they collapse. Laila brings back a fragment of the Stone of Moonlight to help restore their strength. She also warns them that thei Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: すばらしきかなマジョスティック12
The Wonderful Majestic Twelve Return
Subarashikikana Majestic Twelve
episode.summary: The Ancient mamodo begin their attack on Apollo and the others. Zatch, Kiyo, Sunbeam, and Ponygon arrive just in time to help Tia. A showdown is about to happen when Dr. Riddles quickly summons his twelve super-powered friends! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新春スペシャル 華麗なるV(ブイ)よ再び!!
New Year Special, The Magnificent V Appears Again!
Shinshun Special: Kareinaru V yo Futatabi!!
episode.summary: Kiyo and Zatch have at last returned from the fierce battle in the ruins. They are spending a peaceful New Years Day together with Ponygon when Folgore and Kanchomé visit them. Kiyo shrinks back, and grudgingly invites them in. Folgore tells them of a New Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 凶獣デモルト最終決戦!!
Evil Beast Demoruto, Final Deciding Battle!
Kyoujuu Demoruto Saishuu Kessen!!
episode.summary: Zatch’s Seventh Spell Zagurzem appears in his spell book! Kiyo realizes it is a powerful spell that charges up electricity and attracts Zatch’s successive spells to the spot initially hit. He firmly believes that Demolt can be defeated by hammering him wi Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ありがとう僕の王様 ミコルオ・マ・ゼガルガ
Dr. Riddles, You`ll Always Be My King
Arigatou Boku no Ou-sama: Mikoruo Ma Zegaruga
episode.summary: Dr. Riddles` new strategy seems to baffle Belgim, and the team uses this to their advantage. But a surprising miscalculation ends up injuring Dr. Riddles. With the Doctor injured, Kedo utilizes all the wisdom that the Doctor has taught him and comes up wi Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ただいま... そして嵐のテストバトル
I am Back...And Then a Tempest Test Battle
Tadaima... Soshite Arashi no Test Battle
episode.summary: Kiyo heads to school, and Zatch tries to follow. Zatch accidentally gets his toy Vulcan stuck on a track that drives away and chases after it. Suzy tries to tell Kiyo "Welcome back" but is constantly interrupted by Kiyo`s friends. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: もう戻らない! レイラの孤独な闇
I Won`t Go Back! Laila`s Dark Solitude
Mou Modaranai! Reira no Kodoku na Yami
episode.summary: The reunited team agree to leave Zofis to Sherry and Brago. Laila and Albert return. Kiyo and Zatch are happy to see her, but she sends a spell toward them. Kiyo knows that Laila is betraying them out of fear, so he attempts to regain her trust! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 異世界の扉! ガッシュVSブラゴ最強対決
The Door of the Strange World! Strongest Duel, Zatch vs. Brago
Isekai no Tobira! Gash VS Brago Saikyou Taiketsu
episode.summary: Sherry reveals that Nicholas and Majirou attacked first. In a flashback, Brago calls Nicholas and Majirou weak and leaves, but counters when they attempt to attack him. Zatch angered by Brago, begins their battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 異世界放浪! 襲いかかる鉄の軍団
Exile in the Strange World! Attack from the Army!
Isekai Hourou! Osoikakaru Tetsu no Gundan
episode.summary: Maestro tells his servant to call Brago in to talk. He tells Brago how in the In-between World, Mamodos with spell books are able to cast spells without their human partners. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 異世界大決闘! ガッシュ・ブラゴ二大奥義炸裂
The Duel in the Strange World, Zatch and Brago`s Two Great Mysterious Explosions
Isekai Daikettou! Gash, Brago Nidaiougi Sakuretsu
episode.summary: Sherry and Brago continue their attack on Maestro`s barrier in order to test the limits of the coil. They find out "Ion Gravirei" is the limit which the coils can handle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: テッドの哀歌 風の中の少女 運命の再開
Ted`s Blues, The Girl in the Wind, Fate`s Reunion
Ted no Aika, Kaze no Naka no Shoujo, Unmei no Saikai
episode.summary: Ted is bent on finding Cherish, the only mamodo that he looks upon as a family. One day in the city, he smells something that is suspected to be her. Ted and Zatch search everywhere and every suspected people, but it is eventually a mistake. However, Ted deeply believes that one day he will find her... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 異世界の覇者! 復讐に牙むくマエストロ
The Leader of the Strange World, Vengeance of the Fanged Maestro
Isekai no Hassha! Fukushuu ni Kibamuku Maestro
episode.summary: Kiyo, Zatch, and Brago battle Maestro. Kiyo realizes that Maestro`s power involves magnetism and that he is using the coils at the side of the battlefield to increase the powers of his spells. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 愛と青春のモンモン先生 清麿悲劇の惨敗
The Love and Youth of Mr. Mommon, Kiyo`s Disastrous Defeat
Ai to Seishun no Monmon-sensei: Kyomaru Higeki no Zanpai
episode.summary: Kiyo after managing to lose Zatch and Ponygon goes to school. Once there, the teacher Touyama tries to give Kiyo a failing grade by asking him what is his cat`s name. Kiyo manages to figure it out, but Touyama reveals he has a secret weapon Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絶体絶命! 立ちふさがる四天王
The Four Supreme Mamodo
Zettai Zetsumei! Tachifusagaru Shitennou
episode.summary: The stairway collapses and the team is scattered but they manage to split up into three groups and escape into separate paths into the ruin. Little do they know that each path will lead to a powerful Ancient mamodo lying in wait for them! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: もげよフォルゴレ! 愛と悲しみのバグパイプ
Grope It, Folgore! The Bagpipe of Love and Sorrow
Moge yo Folgore! Ai to Kanashimi no Bagpipe
episode.summary: Nicolas is upset about Majirou`s book becoming burnt. When he plays his depression through his bagpipes, it causes anyone who hears it to become sad too. Folgore volunteers to bring Nicholas to Italy to rid his sadness. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シェリー気高き輪舞 炸裂バベルガ・グラビドン
The Return of Sherry and Brago
Sherry Kedakaki Rondo, Sakuretsu Baberuga Grabidon
episode.summary: Zofis summons his Ancient mamodo army to take down Zatch and his team. Weak and out of strength from within, the team finds themselves in a tight spot. Suddenly a familiar spell rings out… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 閃光乱舞! 孤高の戦士パムーン
Pamoon, the Celestial Warrior
Senkou Ranbu! Kokou no Senshi Pamoon
episode.summary: Kedo has returned to the mamodo world. Dr. Riddles quickly picks himself up and leads the way further into the ruin. Kiyo’s team finally encounters the powerful hidden mamodo who has been controlling the deadly stars. His name is Pamoon. While Kiyo is sc Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 我が心のキッド ナゾナゾ博士新たなる誓い
My Dear Kid, Dr. Riddles` New Vow
Waga Kokoro no Kid, Nazonazo Hakase Aratanaru Chikai
episode.summary: Zatch is making a new Vulcan 300 when Tia comes over. Elsewhere, Dr. Riddles is depressed over the lost of Kido. Folgore and Kanchome, while in America, decide to visit Dr. Riddles. Once there, the Majestic Twelve ask Folgore to help cheer up Dr. Riddles. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 異世界からの声! 命運つきた魔物たち!!
The Voice from the Strange World! The Fate of the Demons!
Isekai Kara no Koe! Meiun Tsukita Mamono-tachi!!
episode.summary: In a mysterious place, a Mamodo stands above the symbol of a book and announces a message, to the contestants of the Mamodo battle, to assemble at the light. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たなる脅威 風を語る少年 バオウ抹殺!
A New Threat, The Boy Who Talks of the Wind, Baou Eradication!
Arata Naru Kyoui, Kaze o Kataru Shounen, Baou Massatsu!
episode.summary: The sudden appearance of a mamodo named Arth and his partner, Ellie. They approach to Zatch and Kiyo because they want to eliminate people who know how to use the spell of Boa Zakeruga. However, Kiyo does not even understand the real threat and meaning of the spell of Boa Zakeruga. Facing with Arth’s strong attach, Kiyo is no match for him! Fortunately, Ted and Jido come to help in time. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 月夜の動乱 友情の拳 アース一撃必殺!
Moonlit Night`s Disturbance! Fist of Friendship! Earth`s One-hit Certain Kill!
Tsukiyo no Douran, Yuujou no Kobushi, Earth Ichigeki Hissatsu!
episode.summary: In order to protect their new friend Zatch, Ted and Jido desperately enhance their strength and skills. This surprised Arth. Zatch joins the fight even though he is injured, and he uses the spell of Boa Zakeruga. However, his spell of Boa Zakeruga does not show its real power unexpectedly! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: わがままパティ 惜別のスオウ・ギアクル!!
Selfish Penny, Suou Giakuru of Parting Regrets!
Wagamama Patty: Sekibetsu no Suou Giakuru!!
episode.summary: Penny & Uri and Byonko & Alvin save Zatch and the others from a tight spot! At First they participated in the battle as Zofis’ underlings, but they see the error in their ways.. They rebel against Zofis in the same way as Laila did and appear once again b Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 異世界決闘! シェリーのいないブラゴ
The Duel in the Strange World, When Brago`s Without Sherry
Isekai Kettou! Sherry no Inai Brago
episode.summary: In the Human World, Dr. Riddles, Sunbeam, Folgore and Kanchome are at the structures, investigating them. In the In-between World, Kiyo, Zatch, and Ponygon arrive at the castle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 迷えるシェリー 断ち切れぬ絆!
Perplexed Sherry, The Bond That Cannot be Severed
Mayoeru Sherry: Tachikirenu Kizuna!
episode.summary: Sherry has lost her power from within and is unable to use spells. She has also lost all will to fight. Brago forsakes her and attempts to confront Zofis just with brute strength. However, nothing is accomplished and Brago just gets hurt. Sherry looks at Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 打ち砕け! 封印千年 屈辱の記憶
Free Yourself from a Thousand Years of Pain!
Uchikudake! Fuuin Sennen, Kutsujoku no Kioku
episode.summary: Pamoon laughs off Zatch and Ponygon’s attacks. He dismisses them as naïve. As Pamoon fires off countless attacks, Zatch counters each blow, determined to stop a battle that’s waged out of fear and intimidation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逃げ道なし!! 卑劣なるゾフィス再臨
